raw_text: We investigated four individual approaches for the syntax-features? a regular-expression-based quasi-parser, a system based on Dekang Lin? s Mini Par (Lin, 1993), a system based on the Collins parser (Collins, 1999), and one based on the CMU Link Grammar Parser (Sleator and Temperley, 1993), as well as a family of voting-based combination schemes
